BIO

I am a web developer experienced with front-end technologies including Angular 7, Javascript, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and jQuery for four years, and back-end technologies like C #,ASp .net, Entity framework, SQL-server, to name but some for Three years. I have been in Canada for about one year, during which I have been working on my English, and I have been practicing some personal projects to keep my programming skills up to date.

2018 - 2020

Front-end Developer

I was focusing on the client side of a national scale web application project, which intends to provide and mange required documents and licenses for businesses related to the ministry of agriculture in Iran.
